title: "Meta Released a Specialized version of Llama 2 for Code Generation"
excerpt: "Based on the open-source Llama 2, one of the largest LLMs in the world, with 175 billion parameters, Code Llama is a collection of pre-trained and fine-tuned generative text models ranging in scale from 7 billion to 70 billion parameters."
